name: Sex Simulator - Naughty Trainer
description:
A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a personal trainer and help attractive women achieve their fitness goals.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Step into a world of seduction and fulfill your fantasies with our “Sex Simulation” series!
In this video game, you take on the role of a charismatic, fit guy who wants to escape his desk job to pursue his passion for fitness.
Thanks to your impressive physique, you get a job as a personal trainer, and your exciting journey begins.
Interact with three hot women and help them achieve their body goals. Make them sweat and unleash their full potential.
Will you be able to push your clients to the limit and leave them out of breath?
Immerse yourself in “Naughty Trainer” and find a wide range of intense exercises that will leave you craving more!

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations
